page.title: 07RACHEL`S SHOP IN BROUGHTON
page.content: ON TUESDAY,25th JUNE WE INTERVIEWED A LADY AT RACHEL's FRUIT AND VEGETABLE SHOP.SHE BUYS HER FRUIT AND VEGETABLES FROM A FIRM IN NORTHAMPTON.THEY DELIVER FOUR TIMES A WEEK AT ABOUT 8.30a.m.SHE GETS A LOT OF CUSTOMERS.THE BUSIEST DAYS ARE TUESDAYS,THURSDAYS, FRIDAYS AND SATURDAY MORNINGS.HERE IS A CHART FOR HER HOURS OF BUSINESS. MONDAY 9.00-12.45 CLOSED TUESDAY 9.00-12.45 2.15-5.00 WEDNESDAY 9.00-12.45 2.15-4.30 THURSDAY 9.00-12.45 2.15-5.00 FRIDAY 9.00-12.45 2.15-5.00 SATURDAY 9.00-12.45 2.15-5.00 THE BIGGEST PROBLEMS ARE WHEN THE FRUIT AND VEGETABLES ARE NOT DELIVERED ON TIME.SHE SELLS POTATOES THE MOST ALL YEAR ROUND,THOUGH IN THE SUMMER SHE SELLS A LOT OF SALAD THINGS. IN THE WINTER SHE SELLS MANY CAULIFLOWERS AND BRUSSEL SPROUTS.
